name: Stardust Unicorn
description: Stardust Unicorn — born from cosmic light and ancient magic, this celestial being gallops through nebulae and stardust. Its spiral horn channels the energy of distant galaxies, leaving trails of purple luminescence across the void.

name: Tidecaller King
description: Tidecaller King — an ancient ocean sovereign adorned with coral crown and ornate armor forged in the abyss. His glowing amber eyes pierce through deep waters, commanding tides and storms with a mere thought.

name: Eternal Phoenix
description: Eternal Phoenix — reborn from flames countless times, this immortal bird spreads wings of living fire across mountain peaks. Each feather burns with the intensity of a thousand sunsets, embodying cycles of death and rebirth.

name: Leviathan's Awakening
description: Leviathan's Awakening — from the darkest trenches rises a dragon of the deep, scales like ancient jade and eyes burning with primordial fury. When it stirs, the ocean trembles and legends come alive.

attributes.value: Scaled Armor, Glowing Eyes, Sharp Fangs

name: Emerald Sprite
description: Emerald Sprite — guardian of forgotten forests, she weaves starlight into her hair and wraps herself in living vines. Her luminous wings shimmer with bioluminescent magic as she protects the sacred groves from mortal eyes.

attributes.value: Translucent Wings, Star Crown, Living Vines
